Beef Cubes Â½ kg 

Gram Lentil 1 cup 

Red Chilies 8 

Black Pepper 6 

Black Cardamoms 2 

Cinnamon a piece 

Garlic 4 cloves 

Ginger 1 small piece 

Coriander Seeds 1 tsp 

Cumin Seeds 1 tsp 

Salt to taste 

Yogurt 1 tsp 

Coriander Leaves (chopped) 1 bunch 

Mint Leaves (finely chopped) 1 bunch 

Green Chilies (Julienned) 4 

Onion (finely chopped) 1 

Ginger (Julienned) 1 piece 

Egg Whites 2 

Corn flour/ Rice Flour 2 tbsp 

Oil to fry

1. Wash beef pieces and boil it together with gram lentil with big cardamom, black peppercorn, red chili, salt, coriander seeds, cumin and hot water. Cook it till the meat tenders. 

2. Chop the boiled meat. 

3. Add in coriander, mint leaves, Chopped green chilies, onion, ginger, corn flour and white cumin. 

4. Grease your hand. Make kabab and fry them till golden brown. 

5. Serve hot.
